name: Exquisite Sacrifices
description:
Exquisite Sacrifices were developed in Gang7z Game Jam within 72 hours.

Summary
You are in a dungeon whose where and when is unknown, you have to escape from the evil creature that is chasing you, complete a ritual and regain your freedom.

Controls
WASD - Movement
E - Pick up 
Q - Drop
F - Use

Addition
This game was developed by only me, so I had to use some textures and sounds as ready assets.

Edit: There are a lot of glitches and bugs in game and im aware of them but i have no time to fix them for jam version.
